title: The Malice at the Palace
summary: The Malice at the Palace (also known as the Pacersâ€“Pistons brawl)[2][3] occurred during a National Basketball Association (NBA) game between the Indiana Pacers and the defending champion Detroit Pistons on Friday, November 19, 2004, at The Palace in Auburn Hills, Michigan, United States. The Associated Press (AP) called it "the most infamous brawl in NBA history."[4]
